So far, I've liked E. L. Todd's electrics series best, but this book revised my opinion. I found the first two books very strong and also recommendable and was really looking forward to the third part. The part is all about the feelings of Volt and Taylor and I found it unnecessarily prolonged. Taylor has been raving about Volt for so long, finally admitting everything and then being like a little kid in every argument and getting away with it?! At the same time there were inconsistencies, my feeling, because at the end of the second part, Volt was still trying to convince Taylor's ex and didn't believe him when he said Taylor was standing on him and trying to convince the ex that Taylor couldn't do it without him and that he had heard it himself. But at the beginning of the third part, Volt seems to have forgotten everything and fights for Taylor. I had hoped that this would be the last part of the series and I think that this part is the weakest and at the same time quite unnecessary. I'm going to read the fourth part anyway and hope that Taylor's girlfriend Sarah is Volt's ex. That would bring more tension to the story.

... unfortunately the implementation of the good idea did not succeed. The alarm clock looks nice from my point of view, I also liked the sound very much. Likewise, the Qi charging function is extremely practical and has worked well for me (iPhone X) Unfortunately, the alarm clock is only suitable for singles or people with separate bedrooms, as it relies on a permanent Bluetooth connection. Thus, all sounds that are normally played over the mobile phone are played over the loudspeaker. If you manually disconnect from the connection, a signal sounds again on the alarm clock, also connecting to the alarm clock generates a sound. Therefore the alarm clock is unfortunately not recommended in a bedroom with more than one person. The display was unfortunately too bright for me even in the lowest setting.

I'm very disappointed with the device. My old Phillips machine lasted for 6 years with the first cutting blade and was not much more expensive to buy! I can not recommend this machine after one year! Battery is not exchangeable because it is welded.. visually the set makes a lot but technically it is now for me something for the electrical waste. review_body: Since I often have to deal with many different keys, I thought such an organizer would be more pleasant than running around with a huge keychain all the time. In the beginning, everything went pretty well. However, the varnish went off quite quickly and the screws always had to be tightened. It is nice that this can also be done with one cent coin, but only with one cent coin. I did not find a suitable slotted screwdriver that would not have ruined the whole screw immediately. To get to the most annoying part of the whole thing: attaching the keys. It is nice that you can set the screw to different sizes or lengths through the different parts, but once you have screwed the whole thing together, you need a pair of pliers to take it apart again. Attaching the keys is simply a game of patience, balance and skill. In the end the screw in the thread is broken off during the third time of mounting and thus the whole thing is unusable. Verdict: If at all then for only once all the necessary keys and then never again, but at the price you can also buy a cheaper alternative.

My daughter is thrilled. Great animals. But the game crashes all the time. 10 times in 15 minutes. It's very annoying. When you finally fix this you will get full 5 stars

review_body: The product itself I have not tried yet, but there are points deducted for the way of sending - you do not fold A4 paper 2x! It arrived completely crumpled and crumpled, unbelievable. Further deduction of points for the fact that I asked to cancel the purchase and the seller did not react in any way.

Had ordered the case because I assumed with a 360 ° case that everything is protected. Unfortunately for the front it is just a bumper without protection, so she went back. Too bad she made a good impression
No better than a cheap product. I was really disappointed
Although I bought the cabinet with 3 shelves, I could only build 2 together. The rod has too few holes for 3 shelves. The fabric is too short and not beautiful.
After one season the battery is already broken. I am very disappointed! What about the warranty? A replacement of the battery would be normal after 1 season

I bought the thermal underwear because I work outdoors. The fabric feels good to the touch, but it doesn't really keep you warm. In addition, the substance cannot breathe. After 7 hours of (not strenuous) work, everything was put directly into the washing machine at home and I had to take a shower. Since the fabric cannot breathe, you could not notice the deodorant. Unfortunately, a very big shortcoming! It's a shame, but for the price I should have known better.

I was totally thrilled when I installed the printer. It was annoying that I could not connect to the laptop via W-Lan, but no matter, everything worked via the mobile app, especially since I wanted to print photos... Virtually nothing has worked for a month. Scanning documents becomes a daily task and once the printer manages to feed in the photo paper, it prints only one third of the photo.... it is just as tedious to contact the support. I am very disappointed and will change to another brand soon!
Even the rubber lips of our stirring hooks are cracked - now for the second time. Too bad, I can not give more than 2 stars.

The brushes are great in themselves. However, they stink so bad that I have lost all joy in them. After repeated washing, the smell does not disappear AND the brushes lose hair. I think that's a great pity... The only thing that no longer stinks is the storage box, which could actually be quite handy for travelling.
So we had a lot of different results. Were then both of the opinion that we measure it with ourselves and check better get there.
Device is much too slow and lacked the key for the card slot!!

Several plastic parts were already broken off in the box at the time of delivery, yet the box holds for the time being. I keep the box only because of the really great design and because I only need it for the pool area (goggles, air mattress, etc.), the box matches the color perfectly and I did not want to spend a lot of money on it. Nevertheless, the price is actually not ok, because the quality is really borderline! The box is not worth 20 €!
Poor workmanship -----not recommended
Unfortunately sent back very loud because of this

I have already bought the cartridges for the second time CLEAR at the price you can not expect super quality BUT the cartridges sometimes print very poorly colored to not colored at all and that after a short time. I will switch to another product.

I ordered 4 identical keyboards for the office. Everywhere the same problem: the radio range is approx. 50 cm. So you need a USB extension to place the dongle on your desk. The mouse sits well in your hand, but two stars.

Bad workmanship at the seams, like the bonding at the soles etc. Otherwise the shoes make a very good impression. the workmanship is unfortunately not possible at all. Possibly this is due to the lower price compared to the other offered models which are much more expensive. Shoes went down.

The cover (thin plastic) was unfortunately broken! I asked for a replacement and it worked out great, only for the lamp to have the same damage again... if I wasn't fooled I'd be sent the same one again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! But the service did not deserve more stars...

I decided - also because of the many good reviews - for this more expensive product. I have used various brushes; these hardly rotate in the water; the performance is too weak for that. Outside the water, in the air, the power is enough and the brushes dry well. But unfortunately it hardly gets to this point, because the bracket (s) permanently fall out of the handpiece. As soon as the cleaning process is to begin in water, the connecting piece between brush holder and handpiece falls. I tried it with different brush sizes. It sucks. If it would hold, I would still have too little power to clean.
Water tank ok... unfortunately one arrived broken.
It's not waterproof at all. After the rain the surface was dry but it sucked water in and after the ride I was completely wet. Nor is it soft enough. The height is about 6 cm.
Shaved gently but not really smooth. Too expensive for the result
Very nice light chain, pleasant light color. No 3 replacement bulbs supplied, therefore only two stars
The leather detached from the bow pretty quickly

Fast delivery, unpacked, you watch could not synchronize with mobile phone. Repeatedly installing and uninstalling the app has finally led to success. Watch is under observation. The watch makes a good impression. Possibly the app should get an update as soon as possible. See other reviews.

I'm not very happy with the quality of the material... I keep the Revenger in a separate bag, but still I have a lot of scratches on the display, which is already hard to see. The plastic is just too soft and has absolutely no resistance. The fire button often doesn't work either, you often have to press it a few times to get some steam. The display should be much brighter, so that you can see something even in light. When set to maximum, it is only clearly visible if you are in the house with hardly any lighting. The evaporator itself is top! The NRG tank is super and really nice in design and color.

review_body: The fabric is good and the colours look good. I wear normal dress sizes, unfortunately this monokini does not fit into shape and gives no support. But if a swimsuit is the only thing I wear, I don't want to constantly correct the fit or straighten anything. Short in height and too wide in chest area. No hold for a nice cleavage. Return and refund only possible upon individual negotiation. I now have a swimsuit that stays in the closet. I cannot understand the positive reviews.

Not measuring correctly... We have two more units and if you put all three next to each other the unit displays 8% more humidity than the others. The temperature comes down as much as possible.

We tested the juicer for two weeks and then sent it back. The juicer is constructed in such a way that on the one hand the juice on the other hand the vegetable residues are transported out by spinning. Means if the leftovers are light enough they will be thrown out. Unfortunately, it is then that not enough juice is extracted. Orange juice doesn't work.  when filling at the top you have to insert the filler neck, otherwise it also comes out at the top. Celery makes beautiful green spots on the wall. We bought a Slowjuicer, more expensive but much better!

The storage may be good, but I wanted to be able to hang it behind the door AND close the door. I would say that I have perfectly normal and standardised doors, but the hooks are still far too thick, so that doing this alone does not, firstly, close the door and, secondly, dents are pushed into the wood of the door and the frame. Do not understand that something like this is sold as a door shelf when the door then becomes inoperable. However, I was able to bend the hooks with 2 pliers so that it fits in the end. One is broken off, but the others are enough to carry the shelf.
Is leaking not suitable for two people except for couples villas.

review_body: Headphones already have a loose contact on the cable after little use. Very unsatisfactory.

The 2nd star is only available for the goodwill of the dealer. Replacement and reimbursement went smoothly and quickly!  The adapter simply does not work. Often the laptop did not recognize the disk, and when it was detected, the USB connection broke completely very quickly (opening folders was enough). Another customer also had this problem, see more reviews. After Inateck quickly initiated a replacement delivery, there was exactly the same problem with the replacement device. I had installed an older SSD from Crucial, which was installed for years without problems in my old laptop (native as mSATA).
The automatic lowering mechanism is already broken after 3 weeks. This means that the lid just pops off again like a conventional lid.

I'm still trying to find out if the reviewers bought the same lamp as mine. Bright is different. Maybe great for children playing under duvet, but illuminating a basement does not make this lamp at all. I have LED light bars in my kitchen, they are bright.

Unfortunately, the adapter does not work, which is why I ordered it. I can load and also listen to music. However, then I have a low noise in the background and I wanted the adapter to be able to charge and also make phone calls. Unfortunately, this is not possible. Since I can hear music there are 2 stars. But still not what I wanted.

According to the manufacturer, a deviation of -5 to + 5 measuring points. Unfortunately it looks like three measurements in a row, measurement 1- 129 2- 172 3- 152. I will not recommend this device, because it does not meet the requirements.

I ordered "Happy Dog Supreme Sensitive New Zealand Lamb & Rice" I got "Happy Dog Sensitive New Zealand Lamb" I no longer have an old bag to compare the ingredients. The new bag contains rice flour as an ingredient. Are the ingredients 100% the same? Has only the packaging and description changed? Until this is clarified I give only 2 stars
All good except the annoying humming

Has lasted barely a year. Now I prefer to ride with a hanging chain without a tensioner.

Delivery no later than 30 April. Now we are May 3 and received no delivery and no other information.

Since I had not achieved my desired result, I used it one more time, as in the tutorial, even if the result was not satisfactory. This time it was a complete waste of time! No matter how many times I washed my hair, the smell just didn't go away.

It crackles when you press it and after a short time the dust collects under it. Today my phone fell off and the foil came off completely. The phone was unprotected at the time of the fall. Both survived, but the slide is now splintered at the bottom right edge. Very annoying, because that way the foil does not fulfill its purpose if it comes loose during a fall.

In principle, I am very satisfied with this product. The installation was very easy, and also the wireless range is very good, and there are no problems with the transmission from the inside to the outside. I also find the design of the device appealing. It is kept very simple and can either be mounted on the wall or set up like a small picture frame. The only annoying thing is that after about half a year of use, the device that measures the values on the outside seems to be broken. The thermometer seems to be still intact, here plausible values are still displayed. The hygrometer, on the other hand, is fine, because completely astronomical values of the outside air humidity are always displayed. This is a great pity, as the device was placed on the outside in a protected area and also the reason why I give this product only two stars.

review_body: I only bought this headset for the microphone, because I have high quality headphones and I wear this headset to use the microphone. I've had various "cheap headsets" over the years that I've used in the same way, and while this one is at least stable here (it's not the case with some others), the microphone is the worst I've experienced in all those years. The microphone is too quiet, even if you set it to 100% both in the audio driver and in the program you are using. If you set the voice activation moderately, it does not record softer spoken words, for example at the beginning and end of a sentence. If you set the voice activation more aggressively, the keyboard (a normal rubber dome, i.e. no mechanical keyboard) will also be activated every time you press the keyboard. You have to remember that the microphone is almost in my mouth, but the keyboard is certainly 40cm away. There is therefore no optimal setting that can guarantee a satisfactory recording of the voice. In the end, two stars for stability, but nothing more, because the edges of the plastic are sharp, the pop protection falls down far too easily and the functionality is useless.
Visually a very nice case. But you can see all the fingerprints on the back. After 3 months of use it is already broken and has many scratches.

Only the USB connector wobbled a little. The use of the mouse also worked absolutely flawless and flawless, I was convinced I had made a real bargain. If the mouse had not for unknown reasons suddenly passed no more signal to the laptop it would be 5 stars due to the fast and disappointing defect therefore only 2. If the product works longer it is for sure a good choice, I will buy now however a more durable model.

I let myself be dazzled here by the partly exuberant reviews. First of all I would like to say that I already have 2 Lowepro backpacks in use. A very large one (for storing the equipment) and a rather small one for the most important, everyday things you take with you. Due to the fact that I just bought the Sigma 70-200 2.8, the small Lowepro is now definitely too small and I need a replacement. At Prime Day I bought this backpack for a really very affordable price (almost 29 EUR) and was actually very happy about this purchase, as I had read many of the reviews in advance. When the backpack arrived yesterday, the disillusionment followed: The backpack is not bad for less than 30 EUR, you can not say that. But that it can (as written in many reviews) keep up with the well-known products, which are sold at far higher prices.... Folks, that's just not true! I was really hoping it would be, but there really is no question of that. The upholstered walls are much thinner and do not offer the same protection as my Lowepro. Alas, the divisions inside are of a different calibre, much more labyrinthine. Overall, the feel of this backpack is not comparable to my Lowepro. Also the zippers and the materials of the compartments for the small material are not very high quality. So I decided to go back to the backpack. If I buy equipment of many thousands of EUR, then unfortunately I also have to take the money for a reasonable rucksack in my hand. Quality seems to have its price here. For someone who does not want to spend a lot of money, the backpack is certainly a good choice, but not for me. And it's not that I found the decision difficult. When I unpacked the backpack, I knew after 2 minutes that it was going back. What I really liked was the colour inside. Here you will find your things much quicker than with a grey inner life. For someone who has other requirements for a backpack, the backpack is certainly a great thing, but mine goes back.

I was looking for a head lamp that is versatile, has a good quality and is as inexpensive as possible. Of course, you can't avoid a Ledlenser. After my longer research I ordered a Petzl Tikka for comparison. Unfortunately, I have to say, the Ledlenser was neglected and went back. The decisive point for me was the illuminated area and the color of the light. The Ledlenser illuminates only one circular spot and the light is very cold white. Tikka, on the other hand, illuminates a wider area and has a warmer, more pleasant light. Personally, I find the latter, especially during prolonged use in the near field of vision (e.g. when camping), not so stressful for the eye. Of course it also depends on the area of application and others attach more importance to the wearing comfort or the illumination range, if the lamp is mainly used for jogging, for example. In this regard, I recommended both lamps as very comfortable to wear. Both also hold very well and shine very far. For some, the adjustable focus of the Ledlenser may be an advantage that can certainly be useful in some areas of application. The tikka has more settings and can also glow or flash red. In terms of wearing comfort, you could classify the Ledlenser slightly ahead of the tikka, as the lamp is well balanced due to the battery compartment moved to the rear. The workmanship of the Ledlenser is, as usual, very good.  + very bright + brightness infinitely adjustable + focusable + good wearing comfort and balanced - very cold white light - area of illumination, only one circular spot
as expected - all good

For my regular sports training (tennis & football), I went looking for a good pair of socks. Due to the price and the good design I decided to buy this pair of socks. Before the purchase I was slightly unsure if I would get 3 pairs or only 1 pair for the price. As always, the package arrived very quickly via Amazon Prime and, along with other products, only lasted a day. The pair of socks came wrapped in a plastic wrap and did not look particularly good in terms of packaging. When I unpacked the pair of socks, I was surprised that I only get a pair of socks for 7,98 €, which I find very expensive, even if they are good sport socks. The socks feel like polyester, which is often used in sportswear. After repeated use during sports and continuous stress, I have to say that the socks feel comfortable and also absorb the moisture well. The feet feel protected and you have more stability in the bones. This is definitely a big advantage compared to conventional socks, which can also break down quickly. The socks also make a stable impression from the material and do not tear after short use. Verdict: The socks feel good and are definitely good for sport, yet I think a pair for €7.98 is totally overpriced.

review_body: I bought this electric razor because my older razor had ended his life. Here are some of the facts I have discovered about this product. Positive points: 1. It has 2 additional attachments, i.e. nose and clipper. 2. It is cheap. Normally, the good electric shavers, which come with at least 2 separate attachments, cost about 50 euros. This one is certainly cheaper. 3. It weighs less than the previous 2 electric shavers that I have used in the past. 4. The battery charges quickly and lasts a long time. Negative points: 1. The electric motor is not as powerful and affects the performance of the shaver. I have found that it takes 3 passes to cut the hair that other razors (Panasonic and s.w) would take to cut once. 2. The power switch is in a bad position. The device is mistakenly switched off with a single push of finger or hand during use. 3. The head of the clipper is very small, so it does not cover a large area during use. The disadvantage is that it requires several passes to completely clean the skin area. Verdict: While I am using it for now, I am not completely satisfied with this purchase. The main thing I don't like about this product is its performance. With a more powerful engine, this could have been a great device.

review_body: I bought the set in December 2018. After about 9 days it arrived, okay, it was Christmas time and DHL was probably a bit overloaded. The sound in games is a bit dull, but with video and music quite convincing. For the price quite top, no hi-fi quality, but that is not to be expected either. The subwoofer provides a decent bass and the satellite speakers have a clear sound and good reproduction of voices. The workmanship is impeccable. So, if you want good sound for a relatively low price, definitely recommended. But now the reason why I subtracted 2 stars from my rating: The system has an automatic shutdown, which is extremely annoying. I immediately criticized them and wrote to the devil to see if they could not be switched off (and in my case, the switch-off did not happen after 20 minutes, but somewhere between 5-20 minutes). After 1 week I received a reply that my email had arrived. After about 1 month the answer came, that this would not be possible, but I would like to send it in, if it would happen after 5 instead of 20 minutes. I have been using the system for several months now and came to the following conclusion: The subwoofer switches off, which means that signals with low bass are not considered to be a signal. So it can happen that in the middle of a video where there is only talk, it just goes out in the middle of it. The lamp of the subwoofer is at the rear, so it is not clear whether the system is on or off.  Remove that damn shutdown and put a light on the front and it's a top system. Answers emails at least within a week and not after 1 month.
review_title: Guter Sound, nervende automatische Abschaltung und langsamer Support

When my last backpack got leaking and my university books got wet in the very first week, I immediately started looking for a new backpack! Since I like the vintage style for a long time I searched here and found this backpack! I can't complain! Processing top, holds water super, zippers go well and space is also enough for me. My laptop fits perfectly in the back pocket. Possibly a small padding on the bottom of the backpack would be useful, because e.g. the laptop touches the ground a bit in case the backpack falls off. Sounds worse than it really is. the laptop still has its own smell in the beginning, as it was probably still greased, but passed away after a few days of use! My backpack is a bit darker than in the picture, but I personally find it more beautiful anyway. It is also comfortable to wear and different lengths of the straps can be adjusted. All in one a super backpack that does its job, is top workmanship and looks beautiful. Is a good companion for my everyday life at university. Long-term update: Unfortunately, after a few months, the first "rivets" come off the backpack. After approx. 1 year, unfortunately, a bracket of the backpack is torn off. The reason was another rivet that came loose and the other second rivet could not carry the load on its own. I have already glued the hanger several times in order to be able to continue using the backpack, but this is a great pity.

Because my old wireless headphones soon fall apart with misery, I now had to buy a new one. In my youth I had a wired headset from Sennheiser, which I liked very much at that time. That is why I decided to buy headphones from this manufacturer again. Assembly and commissioning is actually easy for experienced users of wireless headphones, because the controls are no different from other wireless headphones. Once again it is due to my visual impairment that the assembly took me longer. At first, I managed without a manual, but when I looked for the contacts to recharge, the first problems arose. The supplied quick reference guide consists almost only of pictures, I can not do much with it. So I had to search the internet for the user manual. Then I held the wall mount device for the mains socket and asked myself why the thing does not charge, until I discovered the right socket. Last but not least, there was no signal and the headphones served as the receiver of a Polish transmitter, with which I could not use anything. I assumed that the audio cable might be defective and was about to wrap the thing up again, but then at some point it worked out and I had a signal. I think that the battery was not properly charged yet, then such headphones like to bitch around. But now everything works and I give the headphones another chance, although it has some shortcomings. Positive: Loading is easy. The headphones are simply attached to the metal frame of the transmitter with the magnetic contacts on the headband. No more fumbling with the contacts. The headphones are comfortable to wear. The sound is good, at least on television. I haven't checked what it looks like when listening to music. Only one Christmas CD I tried once briefly, with which I had had problems with another wireless headset. Quiet passages were not transmitted. However, the problem did not occur with these headphones. So choir and classical music fans can use this device. Most buttons are easy to touch, except the lever on the transmitter, which can be used to adjust the frequency range. The headphones can therefore also be operated by elderly or disabled people. The audio cable is relatively long, so you can also use the headphones for two playback devices, such as TVs and PCs, when they are close together. The playback starts very quickly, shortly after switching on. Negative: The workmanship is not very high quality. Especially the inner lining of the hearing shells, which covers the loudspeakers, is very thin. The audio cable is firmly installed in the transmitter. This is not without its problems. If the cable gives up its ghost, you can throw the whole thing away, because a repair is not worthwhile with a device in this price range. Sustainable must somehow be different. The power cord is a bit too short for my taste. The power socket is difficult to access. It took a lot of effort to plug in the cable. The transmitter is a bit wobbly because it is very narrow and high. The user manual must, as is unfortunately often the case with electrical appliances, be retrieved from the Internet. Stupid if you don't have the internet, which can happen with older people. Only a short instruction manual is supplied, which describes the commissioning process only figuratively. This is useless for the visually impaired and the blind. I'm curious to see how long it lasts.

The folding table has passed its first tests. But in turn: After delivery and unpacking, I had to deburr a few spots on the circulating plastic with a small file on the underside of the table top, but this was basically unproblematic and done in a few minutes. To the actual things: Unfold and fold again works perfectly, the table is stable and fixed. The braces and hinges are neatly worked, nothing is bent or has dents. The polyrattan on the surface does not seem cheap at all, at this price it is (in a positive sense) quite surprising. At 12 kg, the table is not necessarily a lightweight, but not too heavy for short transport distances. And a few kilograms are definitely an advantage for stability. The table can easily withstand a week in the great outdoors in wind and weather, spray once with the hose, wipe with water and a dash of washing up liquid, rub dry and the table looks like new. Overall and especially with regard to the almost extremely favourable price a clear purchase recommendation. I omit the 5th star, because some people could have overlooked the 2, 3 somewhat sharp edged areas at the bottom of MY table and there could then possibly be some minor skin injuries on the fingers... if you are not careful.

You should also be careful that you do not hang the transmitter next to a Wi-Fi stick. The construction was fine and the finished product visually beautiful. There is also a lot of space for shoes, but they stand out in large shoe sizes (with us 42 and 43). This is no problem with the lower shelves because you can simply push them through and then you do not see it from the front, but the first board has this bow so you can not push anything through and since this is the only possible floor to store even higher shoes (boots or the like) it looks quite strange. Nevertheless, I can positively remark that it is visually beautiful and stable and also offers quite a lot of storage space for the shoes. The film is not that bad now, as many write. Sure, of course, the story is totally constructed, and always conceived according to the same F scheme. When you see the beginning, you know what the end is like. And the message is always the same: Man destroys everything, and does not appreciate anything, and does not learn! And this is exactly what the film wants to tell us! How many times did I just think about the movie (even though I know that it's just a movie and the animals are from the computer): Oh my God, the poor animals, there are often tears in your eyes. As such, Jurassic World The Fallen Kingdom is well and truly made. It's just a shame that people just don't get the message behind the film, even though it's a mainstream film. We are consistently destroying animals and the environment and ultimately our planet and ourselves. Out of greed and greed, and out of stupidity and arrogance! Empathy for the environment and living beings: Missing. 4 stars, because the film is well made, but unfortunately always according to the same principle, otherwise 5 stars would have been in it. Still, well-made popcorn.
review_title: Mensch zerstört alles, weiß nichts zu schätzen und lernt nicht dazu!

# Purchase motivation My daughter wanted a new diving mask with snorkel. # Scope of delivery and condition The mask came with loose snorkel, replacement seals, holder for Gopro and a bag with closure. The mask also has 2 earplugs for which there are holders on the front of the mask. # First impression and processing The mask makes a very high-quality impression. Everything fits together very well, you have the feeling that someone has really thought about it when developing. The fit of the mask can be adjusted very well with the two wide elastic bands. # Conclusion After the first use in the swimming pool my daughter (10 years) says: "I find the mask very good, it only presses strongly against the face under water." I think that the mask is still a bit too big for her. During the whole time in the water, the mask is not tarnished. After the swim, the mask came to dry in her storage bag. # Rating: 4 stars because: My daughter turned up once and had water in her mask. Since I am not sure if the water entered the mask on the side or came through the snorkel, I can only give 4 stars so far. If we have gained more experience, we will complement this review! # More questions I will be happy to answer. If this review has helped you, then I would be very happy about a click on "useful," thank you!

While some frequencies of the song almost hurt the ears, higher and lower frequencies are just good enough to be heard. My old loudspeaker did not reproduce bass well as bass, but the frequencies were displayed quite naturally in the volume. review_body: The washable pads are really great. They come with 2 bags, one for storage, one for washing. The pads are soft and dissolve even waterproof mascara very well. So far I have only tried hand washing, but that worked out very well, I am already looking forward to the first wash in the machine. However, I was very disappointed with the packaging. Because unlike pictured, the pads came in a plastic bag. This is a bitter disappointment, especially as I have not found any information on how to wash the pads anywhere. Hence the prints for the packaging design, but this should not deter anyone from buying the pads, because they save a lot of additional packaging waste.

The range of the good remote control of the quite fast drone is unfortunately only about 30m.

review_body: Since there are hardly any reviews to read here, I was very sceptical at first. However, as I am going to a festival this year and would like to sleep in the car, I ordered them on good luck. Included in the delivery were the mattress and a car air pump. To the mattress: I put them in the car (Citroen Berlingo) for testing. I noticed that there is some mould on one side. I brushed it off and hope he doesn't show up again. In the inflated state, a lying test was carried out directly. It sits well on it and fits perfectly to the festival. Of course, this mattress cannot replace your own bed, but the one for days at the event, it is pure luxury. The mattress fits perfectly in my car. Before that, we took out the rear seats. So it fits perfectly. The air pump: The air pump has different adapters. The mattress requires two different adapters, which can also be found on the pump. The pump is plugged into the car's cigarette lighter. However, the connector was defective (something on the solder joint). Since my friend is a skilled craftsman, he was able to repair it and reassembled the good part worked great and pumped up the mattress in no time. Overall, I am very enthusiastic about the mattress. I'm looking forward to the endurance test at the festival. I hope that it will not lose its breath and will last for a long time. Likewise, it does not reappear mould. After the test I can recommend it in any case. If I should have other experiences, I will revise the review accordingly (if possible).
